join hortbot 999 foobar 1


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1;testing-admin=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!admin spam
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Usage: !admin spam <num> <message>

send hortbot #foobar [HB] Usage: !admin spam <num> <message>

send hortbot #foobar [HB] Usage: !admin spam <num> <message>
